subject: Re: Dynamic parameters and TestSuites

messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger writes:


> ...and buy /JUnit Recipes/, which will ship in the next two weeks. :)

I'll second that. I bought it through Manning's Early Access Program and it
is an excellent book. It consists of every interesting topic discussed on
this list peppered with J.B.'s experience.

Robert Koss, Ph.D.
Senior Consultant
www.objectmentor.com
